title: Touch Notifier Companion App
tooltip: IoT mobile companion app for the "Touch Notifier" IoT Node.js app.
description: An IoT mobile companion app that receives data wirelessly and notifies a user if the touch sensor on the companion IoT device is being touched. The complementary IoT Node.js app is named "Touch Notifier" and can be found in the "Templates" section of the "Internet of Things (IoT)" part of the "Start a New Project" page (from the Projects tab).
